English 
 A Winter in the Alps?‚òÉ Chef(s) for Austria... 
 Are you an excellent chef or perhaps just a natural talent in the kitchen? Then you're exactly who we're looking for! ü•≥ 
 We are a Danish chain -  www.smallaustrianhotels.com  - operating hotels in Austria, both summer and winter. (A part of Thinggaard Travel) 
 The snow has arrived, and people are flocking to Austria, which is wonderful ‚Äì but we could use more hands in our kitchens! 
 Currently, we‚Äôre looking for: 
 
 Chef/kitchen assistant for our hotel in Aurach (2 positions) 
 Chef for our hotels in Saalbach (2 positions) 
 Chef for our hotel in Wagrain (1 position) 
 
 What we offer: 
 
 A season full of fantastic experiences with amazing colleagues 
 A job in a young organization with big dreams of creating something unique in Austria 
 A season with plenty of skiing time 
 A 6-day work week, 48 hours (in accordance with Austrian regulations) 
 Accommodation 
 Salary according to Austrian regulations 
 Opportunity to continue within the company in Denmark after the season (currently 3 hotels and 6 restaurants) 
 Opportunity to continue in Austria for the summer season 
 Significant influence in the kitchen you‚Äôll be working in 
 
 What we expect: 
 
 That you‚Äôre skilled in the kitchen and capable of preparing great meals while keeping an eye on kitchen costs 
 That you‚Äôre cheerful, smiling, and full of energy 
 That you‚Äôre not too proud to help colleagues in other roles when needed 
 That you enjoy creating memorable experiences for our guests 
 That you can plan your own workday 
 That you‚Äôre not afraid to pitch in with some dishwashing from time to time 
 
 You can become a part of all these fantastic experiences right away ‚Äì starting as soon as possible! 
 If this sounds like something for you, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact me. I can be reached at  kasper@thinggaard.dk  or by phone at  +45 60174832 . 
 Please share with your chef friends!
